text: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translation.en.sahih: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.
translation.id.indonesian: Allah berfirman: "Peganglah ia dan jangan takut, Kami akan mengembalikannya kepada keadaannya semula,
